# Purpose: Tools for security analysis, vulnerability scanning, and code quality

# Security Scanning

safety>=3.0.0                    # Dependency vulnerability scanner
pip-audit>=2.7.3                 # Audit Python packages for vulnerabilities

pylint>=3.0.3                    # Python code analysis
flake8>=7.0.0                    # Style guide enforcement

# Secrets Detection
